name: Modern Sky Fighting 3D
description:
Modern Sky Fighting 3D is a super fun challenging 3D air combat simulation game .Fly over 20 different air combat battlefield missions, use your fly skill as a fighter plane pilot, make big fights maneuvers to keep your target locked so you can aim and shoot the enemies planes out of the air. Your job as a fighter plane pilot is to take out these bomber and fighter planes before the time runs out, it’s up to you to clear the battlefield in the air and to shoot the enemy straight out off the sky.
- Fun action-packed combat target flight game
- Easy controls using on screen steering
- Great 3D flights missions, take part in 20 different combat battlefield operations
